item.title: Today’s Wordle #1693: Hints and Answer for February 6, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1693 for February 6, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, February 6, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1693 is just as hard as yesterday’s. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 5.1 of 6 guesses. That makes it slightly harder than the 5-guess average from February 5.

General Wordle Hints For February 6

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word is strongly tied to a formal setting.
  • Hint 2: It’s most often associated with authority or control.
  • Hint 3: The object is small but carries symbolic weight.
  • Hint 4: You’re more likely to see it used than use it yourself.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1693 for February 6, 2026.

Starter Words For February 6, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • CRANE
  • VAULT
  • LAYER
  • GROWL

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1693 On February 6, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: SWOOP

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

GAVEL can be both a noun or a verb. As a noun, it means “a small mallet used by the presiding officer of a meeting, a judge, etc., usually to signal for attention or order.” As a verb, it means “to chair (a legislative session, convention, meeting, etc.).”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1692 on February 5, 2026

Answer: SWOOP

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1693?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on February 7 will be Wordle Game #1694.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…

item.title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Xbox Release Date Revealed
item.content:encoded:
Square Enix has finally revealed the Xbox release date for Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, arriving alongside the Switch 2 version on June 3, 2026.

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth was long rumoured to arrive for the Switch 2 and Xbox consoles in 2026, and it was also claimed that both versions will arrive on the same day. The Switch 2 edition received a release date announcement during their latest Nintendo Partner Direct, and the Xbox version’s confirmation came soon after.

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Releases on Xbox and Switch 2 on the Same Day

Square Enix’s latest post on X (formerly Twitter) confirms Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth’s Xbox release date for June 2026. Interested readers can pre-order the game right now through the Xbox Store. The title features a 20% launch discount currently in select regions, bringing the game’s price down to $39.99 from the original $49.99.

That confirms the release for Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth across all platforms. The next step is to wait for a proper reveal of Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 3. Insider NateTheHate discussed that Rebirth’s June release date could set the stage for a reveal of FF7 Remake Part 3 at Summer Game Fest 2026, and that they could “very likely confirm” that Part 3 will release day and date on all platforms. Despite his record, readers should take this information with a grain of salt.

In other news, Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 3’s title has been decided, and it will stick to Unreal Engine 4. Additionally, the next instalment will also bring back the snowboarding mini-game. What are your thoughts on Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth releasing for Xbox and Switch 2 in June 2026? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about PlayStation announcing a new Horizon multiplayer game for PS5 and PC. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
